entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: Wormtail is the one who pulled open the robes on the ground, revealing what was inside them.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry let out a yell that was strangled in the wad of material blocking his mouth.

entities.name: the thing
entities.description: The thing Wormtail had been carrying is described as ugly, slimy, and blind.

relationships.description: Harry saw the thing, describing it as hairless and scaly-looking.
